instructions: On your iPhone or iPad, open the Chrome app . At the bottom right, tap More and then Settings . Tap Content Settings . Tap the permission that you want to update.

Image titled Get the Permalink to an Amazon Kindle Fire App Step 1 1 Visit the Amazon website in your web browser. Image titled Get the Permalink to an Amazon Kindle Fire App Step 2 2 Search for the app you'd like to find the permalink for. Make sure the category to the left of your search term is set to "Apps for Android". Image titled Get the Permalink to an Amazon Kindle Fire App Step 3 3 Click the item that needs it's permalink to be viewed. Image titled Get the Permalink to an Amazon Kindle Fire App Step 4 4 Locate the address that is now in the address bar. This will be the permalink that you may send to others to send them directly to this page of the website, and which will automatically have the person open the page, where they can download the app, if they use any of the Amazon Kindle Fire products.
